content.rendered:
Specifications

Camera 700TVL CMOS high-resolution
Camera Viewing Angle 92°
Visible Range (Night) 1.5m
Dimensions (H*W*D) VE (02/03/04/06)-A01: 128*256*48 (mm)
VE (08/10/12)-A01: 128*331*48 (mm)
Installation Method Surface & Embedded Mount
Material Aluminum Alloy
Operating Temperature -20°C to 60°C
Ingress Protection Rating IP54
Power Supply DC15V 1.2A
Reading Capacity 50pcs Cards
Reading Distance 2 to 5cm
Card Type 125Khz RFID
Certifications CE, FCC, RoHS

excerpt.rendered:
2-12 Multi-unit series is an analog 4-wire door station that offers video intercom, monitoring, entrance-unlocking
and night vision function (with optional mute function), providing a high level of security surveillance service. The
4-wire system with plug-and-play connectors simplify the installation process. The outdoor unit has multiple call
buttons (2/3/4/5/6/8/10/12 optional).
• 700TVL CMOS high-resolution camera, supports IR Night Vision
• Full aluminum front panel, IP54
• Easy installation, wired connection stability
• Optional video intercom with 2/3/4/6/8/10/12 monitors
Features
